pages.text: Purchase tickets for Shows and Events at Tennessee Williams Theatre.
Purchase tickets for Shows and Events at Tennessee Williams Theatre.

The Producers Circle at the Tennessee Williams Theatre is a vital fundraising program that forms the foundation of support for the theatre's operations and programming. Members of the Producers Circle make significant financial contributions, which in turn enable the theatre to bring world-class entertainment, including national tours and performing artists, to the island community. In recognition of their generosity, Producers Circle members receive various perks such as prime seating for a selection of shows, or even all shows depending on their donation level, and prominent listing in the theatre's playbills. This dedicated group of philanthropists plays a crucial role in sustaining the tradition of high-quality cultural experiences at the Tennessee Williams Theatre.
Access to the Producers Lounge with Open Bar at Main Stage Shows
First chance to purchase your selected seats for all other shows
Name showcased on Tennessee Williams Theatre Seasonal Donor Board
Recognition on the Producers Circle page in all TW Theatre playbills & online
Businesses get a full-page ad in the season program
Guided backstage tour of the theatre with Executive Director, Matthew Rawls
Invite to Season Kick-off Party & Next Season Announcement Party
